title: Lesson 8: Introduction to Classes
description: Learn the basics of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) with classes and objects. Define a simple class, create instances (objects), and add methods.
problem: Define a class `Dog` with an `__init__` method that takes `name` and `breed` as arguments and stores them as instance attributes. Add a method `bark()` to the `Dog` class that returns the string 'Woof!'.
